name: Frank'sRules
0:
”Alexa, open frank's rules”
”Alexa, start frank's rules”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: frank's rules
des:
Start your day with an inspirational quote. These are some of the thoughts that helped me get through my work day.
When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
